description.english: Pass the initial checks.
description.french: Passer les vérifications initiales.
description.italian: Supera le verifiche iniziali.
description.spanish: Pasa la comprobación inicial.
description.japanese: 初期チェックに合格。
description.brazilian: Passar as verificações iniciais.

displayName.japanese: エロヒムの寺院の広間

description.english: Enter Elohim's temple.
description.french: Entrer dans le Temple d'Elohim.
description.italian: Entra nel tempio di Elohim.
description.spanish: Entra en el templo de Elohim.
description.japanese: エロヒムの寺院に入ります。
description.brazilian: Entre no templo de Elohim.

description.english: Search for other lands.
description.french: Rechercher d'autres terres.
description.italian: Cerca altre terre.
description.spanish: Busca otras tierras.
description.japanese: 別の土地を探す。
description.brazilian: Pesquise por outras terras.

description.english: Use the connectors to win a prize!
description.german: Benutze die Konnektoren um etwas zu gewinnen.
description.french: Utilisez les connecteurs pour gagner un prix!
description.italian: Utilizza i connettori per vincere un premio!
description.spanish: ¡Utiliza los conectores para ganar un premio!
description.japanese: コネクターを使って賞品を手に入れろ！
description.brazilian: Use os conectores para ganhar um prêmio!

description.english: ...but let's be honest, it works the same.
description.german: ... aber seien wir ehrlich, das Prinzip ist das Gleiche.
description.french: ... mais soyons honnêtes, ça fonctionne de même.
description.italian: ...ma siamo sinceri, funziona lo stesso.
description.spanish: ...pero seamos honestos, funciona de la misma manera.
description.schinese: ......但说实话，它的工作原理是相同的。
description.tchinese: ......但說實話，它的工作原理是相同的。
description.russian: ...но по совести говоря, это работает так же.
description.japanese: …ただし、正直に言うと、同じようにうまくいく。
description.polish: ... ale bądźmy szczerzy, działa tak samo.
description.brazilian: ...mas vamos ser honestos, funciona da mesma maneira.

displayName.japanese: 印章では十分ではない

description.english: Pick up a star.
description.french: Soulever Une Étoile.
description.italian: Raccogli una stella.
description.spanish: Recoge una estrella.
description.japanese: 星を拾え。
description.brazilian: Pegue uma estrela.

displayName.japanese: 驚異の粘り強さを検出

description.english: Try, fail, try again, fail again, eventually succeed.
description.german: Versuchen, scheitern, erneut versuchen, wieder scheitern, schließlich erfolgreich sein.
description.french: Essayer, échouer, réessayer, rééchouer, réussir la suite.
description.italian: Prova, fallisci, riprova, fallisci di nuovo, alla fine riesci.
description.koreana: 다시, 결국 성공 실패, 다시 시도, 시도 실패.
description.spanish: Intenta, fracasa, intenta de nuevo, fracasa de nuevo, ten éxito con el tiempo.
description.schinese: 尝试，失败，再试，再失败，最终获得成功。
description.tchinese: 嘗試，失敗，再試，再失敗，最終獲得成功。
description.russian: Пытайся, потерпи неудачу, снова пытайся, снова потерпи неудачу,  в конце концов добьешься успеха.
description.japanese: 挑戦し、失敗。また挑戦し、失敗しても、最後には成功する。
description.polish: Spróbuj, odnieś porażkę, spróbuj ponownie, ponownie odnieś porażkę. W końcu się uda.
description.brazilian: Tente, falhe, tente denovo, falhe denovo, e eventualmente o sucesso virá.

description.english: Accept Elohim's wisdom.
description.french: Accepter la sagesse d'Elohim.
description.italian: Accetta la saggezza di Elohim.
description.spanish: Acepta la sabiduría de Elohim.
description.japanese: エロヒムの知恵を受け入れる。
description.brazilian: Aceite a sabedoria de Elohim.

description.english: Run the sand through your robot hands.
description.german: Lass den Sand durch deine Roboter-Hände rinnen.
description.french: Faire passer le sable entre vos mains de robot.
description.italian: Lascia la sabbia passare per le tue mani da robot.
description.spanish: Corre la arena entre tus manos robóticas.
description.schinese: 通过你的机器人手跑砂。
description.tchinese: 通過你的機器人手跑砂。
description.russian: Пропускать песок через свои механические руки.
description.japanese: ロボットの手で砂の中を走り抜ける。
description.polish: Przesyp piasek przez swoje ręce robota.
description.brazilian: Deixe a areia passar por sua mão de robô.

description.english: Tell the others what you think.
description.german: Sag den Anderen, was du denkst.
description.french: Dire aux autres ce que vous pensez.
description.italian: Di' agli altri ciò che pensi.
description.spanish: Diles a los demás que piensas.
description.japanese: 自分の考えを他人に伝える。
description.brazilian: Conte aos outros o que você pensa.

description.english: Use the power of air to your advantage.
description.german: Nutze die Kraft der Luft zu deinen Gunsten.
description.french: Utiliser le pouvoir de l'air à votre avantage.
description.italian: Usa il potere dell'aria a tuo vantaggio.
description.spanish: Usa el poder del aire a tu ventaja.
description.schinese: 利用空气动力，你的优势。
description.tchinese: 利用空氣動力，你的優勢。
description.russian: Использовать мощность воздуха в своих целях.
description.japanese: 自分に有利になるよう、大気の力を使用する。
description.brazilian: Use o poder do ar a seu favor.

description.english: Enter the Land of Faith.
description.french: Entrer dans la Terre de la Foi.
description.italian: Entra nella Terra di Fede.
description.spanish: Entra en la tierra de fe.
description.japanese: 真実の土地に入ります。
description.brazilian: Entre na Terra da Fé.

description.english: That's what axes are for!
description.french: C'est à quoi servent les haches!
description.italian: È per questo che servono le asce!
description.spanish: ¡Para esto sirven las hachas!
description.japanese: これぞ斧の使い道だ！
description.brazilian: Pra isso que servem os machados!

description.english: A little curiosity never killed the cat.
description.german: Ein wenig Neugier kann nicht schaden.
description.french: Un peu de curiosité ne sera pas punie.
description.italian: Un po' di curiosità non ha mai ucciso il gatto.
description.spanish: Un poco de curiosidad nunca mató al gato.
description.schinese: 有点好奇从来没有害死猫。
description.tchinese: 有點好奇從來沒有害死貓。
description.japanese: 少しぐらい好奇心を出しても死にはしない。
description.polish: Odrobina ciekawości jeszcze nigdy nie zabiła kota.
description.brazilian: Um pouco de curiosidade nunca matou o gato.

description.english: Find a Messenger's abode.
description.french: Trouver la Demeure d'un Messager.
description.italian: Trova la dimora di un Messaggero.
description.spanish: Encuentra la morada de un mensajero.
description.japanese: 使徒の住居を見つける。
description.brazilian: Escontre a casa de algum Mensageiro.

description.english: Receive guidance from Elohim's messengers.
description.french: Recever des conseils des Messagers d'Elohim.
description.italian: Ricevi assistenza dai messaggeri di Elohim.
description.spanish: Recibe el consejo de los mensajeros de Elohim.
description.japanese: エロヒムの使徒から助言を受け取る。
description.brazilian: Receba orientação dos mensageiros de Elohim.

description.english: Successfully engage in co-op mode with yourself.
description.german: Interagiere erfolgreich mit dir selbst im Co-Op Modus.
description.french: Engager avec succès dans le mode co-op avec vous-même.
description.italian: Intraprendi con successo il modo cooperativo con te stesso.
description.spanish: Participa en el modo co-op contigo mismo.
description.schinese: 成功地搞合作社模式与自己。
description.tchinese: 成功地搞合作社模式與自己。
description.russian: Успешно самому вступить в кооперативный режим.
description.japanese: 自分自身で協力モードに参加する。
description.polish: Z powodzeniem dołącz do trybu co-op z samym sobą.
description.brazilian: Envolvido no modo cooperação com sucesso.

description.english: Stand on your own two shoulders.
description.french: Tenir sur ses deux épaules.
description.italian: Mettiti sulle proprie spalle.
description.spanish: Está parado sobre tus dos hombros.
description.japanese: 自分自身を手本にする。
description.brazilian: Suporte em seus próprios ombros.

description.english: Communicate with your double.
description.french: Communiquer avec votre double.
description.italian: Comunica con il tuo doppio.
description.spanish: Comunícate con tu doble.
description.japanese: 分身と意思疎通する。
description.brazilian: Comunique-se com sua dupla.

description.english: Don't just peek. Do it.
description.french: Ne vous contentez pas jeter un regard. Faites-le.
description.italian: Non soltanto sbirciare. Fallo.
description.koreana: 단지 안 돼요. 그 작업을 수행합니다.
description.spanish: No te limites a echar un vistazo. Hazlo.
description.schinese: 不只是偷看。做到这一点。
description.tchinese: 不只是偷看。做到這一點。
description.japanese: 覗いているだけじゃなく。行動しろ。
description.polish: Nie zerkaj. Po prostu to zrób.
description.brazilian: Não fique somente espiando. Faça.

description.english: Laugh at the pointlessness of existence.
description.german: Lache über die Sinnlosigkeit der Existenz.
description.french: Rire de l'inutilité de l'existence.
description.italian: Ridi sulla futilità dell'esistenza.
description.spanish: Ríete de la inutilidad de la existencia.
description.japanese: 存在の無意味さを笑う。
description.brazilian: Ria do sentido da existência.

description.english: Strike a deal.
description.french: Parvenir à un accord.
description.italian: Raggiungi un accordo.
description.spanish: Llega a un acuerdo.
description.japanese: 合意する。
description.brazilian: Chegar a um acordo.

description.english: Do as you're told (for now).
description.french: Faites ce qu'on vous dit (pour l'instant).
description.italian: Fa' quello che ti viene detto (per il momento).
description.spanish: Haz lo que te digan (por ahora).
description.schinese: 难道因为有人告诉你（现在）。
description.tchinese: 難道因為有人告訴你（現在）。
description.japanese: 言われたとおりにする(取敢えず今は)。
description.brazilian: Faça o que lhe foi dito (por agora).

description.english: Get everything on your own.
description.french: Obtenez tout par vous-même.
description.italian: Ottieni tutto da solo.
description.spanish: Consigue todo por tu propia cuenta.
description.japanese: すべて自分で手に入れる。
description.brazilian: Faça tudo você mesmo.

description.english: See what the others have to say.
description.german: Schau, was die Anderen so zu sagen haben.
description.french: Voir ce que les autres ont à dire.
description.italian: Vedi cosa gli altri hanno da dire.
description.spanish: Ve lo que los demás tienen que decir.
description.japanese: 他の者の言い分を聞いてみよう。
description.polish: Sprawdź, co inni mają do powiedzenia.
description.brazilian: Veja o que os outros têm a dizer.

displayName.japanese: 悪のヘビを追い詰める

description.english: Expose the flaws in the code.
description.french: Exposer les failles dans le code.
description.italian: Rivela i difetti nel codice.
description.spanish: Expone los defectos en el código.
description.japanese: コードの欠点を暴け
description.brazilian: Exponha as falhas no código.

description.english: Do not allow the serpent to fill you with doubt.
description.german: Lass dich nicht von der Schlange mit Zweifel füllen.
description.french: Ne laissez pas le serpent vous remplir de doute.
description.italian: Non permettere al serpente di farti dubitare.
description.koreana: 뱀은 의심의 여지가 당신을 채울 수 없습니다.
description.spanish: No dejes que la serpiente te llene de duda.
description.schinese: 不要让蛇对你充满怀疑。
description.tchinese: 不要讓蛇對你充滿懷疑。
description.russian: Не позволяй змею вселять в тебя сомнения.
description.japanese: 悪意あるヘビにそそのかされ、疑いを抱くなかれ。
description.polish: Nie dopuścić aby wąż przepełnił Cię wątpliwościami.
description.brazilian: Não permita que a serpente o preencha com dúvidas.

description.english: It's not for everyone!
description.french: Ce n'est pas pour tout le monde!
description.italian: Questo non è per tutti!
description.spanish: ¡No es para todo el mundo!
description.japanese: 誰もが得られるものではない！
description.brazilian: Não é para todos!

displayName.japanese: 前回の安定したバージョン

description.english: Restore a backup version of yourself.
description.german: Stelle eine Sicherungskopie von dir selbst wieder her.
description.french: Restaurer une version de sauvegarde de vous-même.
description.italian: Ripristina la versione backup di te stesso.
description.spanish: Restaura una versión de copia de seguridad de ti mismo.
description.japanese: バックアップした自分自身を復元しろ。
description.brazilian: Restaure uma versão de backup de si mesmo.

description.english: Reach the top.
description.french: Atteindre le sommet.
description.italian: Raggiungi la cima.
description.spanish: LLega a la cima.
description.japanese: 頂きに到達する。
description.brazilian: Alcance o topo.

description.english: It is never too late to accept Elohim's forgiveness.
description.german: Es ist nie zu spät, um Elohim um Vergebung zu bitten.
description.french: Il n'est jamais trop tard pour accepter le pardon d'Elohim.
description.italian: Non è mai troppo tardi per accettare il perdono di Elohim.
description.koreana: 그것은 엘로힘의 용서를 받아 들일 결코 늦지 않습니다.
description.spanish: Nunca es demasiado tarde para aceptar el perdón de Elohim.
description.schinese: 它是永远不会太晚接受神的宽恕。
description.tchinese: 它是永遠不會太晚接受神的寬恕。
description.russian: Никогда не поздно принять прощение Элохима.
description.japanese: エロヒムの許しを受け入れるのに、遅すぎることなどない。
description.polish: Nigdy nie jest za późno, aby zaakceptować przebaczenie Elohima.
description.brazilian: Nunca é tarde para aceitar o perdão de Elohim.

description.english: Bring the end of your generations.
description.german: Bringe das Ende deiner Nachkommen herbei.
description.french: Apporter la fin de vos générations.
description.italian: Porta la fine alle tue generazioni.
description.spanish: Pon fin a tus generaciones.
description.japanese: 世代に終止符を打つ。
description.brazilian: Traga o fim de suas gerações.

description.english: Internalise the voice of doubt.
description.french: Internaliser la voix du doute.
description.italian: Interiorizza la voce del dubbio.
description.spanish: Internaliza la voz de la duda.
description.japanese: 疑いの声を取り入れる。
description.brazilian: Internalize a voz da dúvida.

description.english: Collect all pieces of written information.
description.french: Recueillir tous les éléments d'information écrite.
description.italian: Raccogli tutte le informazioni scritte.
description.koreana: 기록 된 정보의 모든 조각을 수집합니다.
description.spanish: Reune toda las piezas de información escrita.
description.japanese: 書類に書かれた情報の一部を集める。
description.brazilian: Colete todos os pedaços de informação escrita.

description.english: Listen to all she has to say.
description.german: Hör dir alles an, was sie zu sagen hat.
description.french: Écouter tout ce qu'elle a à dire.
description.italian: Ascolta tutto ciò che lei ha da dire.
description.spanish: Escucha todo lo que tiene que decir.
description.russian: Послушай все, что она должна сказать.
description.japanese: 彼女の話に耳を傾ける。
description.polish: Wysłuchaj wszystkiego co ona ma do powiedzenia.
description.brazilian: Escute tudo que ela tem para dizer.

description.english: Solve every mystery in every land, that you might aid those who walk in your footsteps.
description.german: Löse jedes Rätsel in jedem Land, so dass du jenen, die in deinen Fußstapfen folgen, helfen kannst
description.french: Résoudre tous les mystères dans tous les pays, pour que vous pourriez aider ceux qui marchent dans vos pas.
description.italian: Risolvi ogni mistero in ogni terra, cosicché potresti aiutare coloro che camminano sulle tue orme.
description.koreana: 당신이 당신의 발자취를 사람들에게 도움을 수도, 모든 땅의 모든 신비를 해결합니다.
description.spanish: Resuelve cada misterio en cada tierra para poder ayudar a los que sigan tus pasos.
description.schinese: 解决每一个谜在每一块土地，那你可能会帮助那些走在你的脚步谁。
description.tchinese: 解決每一個謎在每一塊土地，那你可能會幫助那些走在你的腳步誰。
description.russian: Реши каждую загадку в каждой земле, и так ты можешь помочь тем, кто за тобой следует.
description.japanese: すべての土地のあらゆる謎を解き明かせば、意志を継ぐ者たちの助けとなるかもしれない。
description.polish: Rozwiąż każdą zagadkę, w każdej krainie, aby wspomóc tych którzy będą kroczyć twoimi śladami.
description.brazilian: Resolva cada mistério em cada terra, assim você ajuda aqueles que seguem seus passos.

description.english: Get your user profile.
Free Garrett.
Initiate the ascension process.
Rescue Admin from his prison cell.
